author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Tirupur Exporters Association (TEA) has welcomed the guidelines issued for Amended Technology Upgradation Fund Scheme (ATUFS) that cover the financial and operational parameters for the scheme. “Since the ATUFS is meant for a defined period of five years, the exporters can plan accordingly to make investments to modernise the units. This will help them in their pursuit to give value-addition to the garments meant for niche markets”, opined TEA president A. Sakthivel.

The exporters also expressed happiness over the rates of Capital Investment Subsidy for units.
title: TEA welcomes guidelines
